mapper.insert: insert into sys_business (business_id, business_name, app_id, create_user, create_time, icon) values (#{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_business set business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select bu.business_id from tb_user u inner join sys_group_leader e on u.u_id=e.user_id inner join sys_group r on e.group_id= r.id inner join sys_business_group s on (r.id=s.group_id) inner join sys_business bu on (bu.id=s.business_id) where u.u_id = #{uId} and r.game_type = #{gameType}
select s.business_id from sys_group g inner join sys_business_group b on g.id=b.group_id inner join sys_business s on s.id = b.business_id
select count(*) from tb_user u inner join sys_group_leader l on(u.u_id=l.user_id) inner join sys_group g on(g.id=l.group_id) where u.u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and g.game_type=#{gameType}
